attributes.action: Call an Immediate General Election, for the good of Great Britain and Her People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time for an immediate election in the UK. Fiasco and Lies are all that are associated with this government now. It is time for the British People to elect a government they can trust and follow. Give us the chance to make this choice, it is our right; a right that millions of Britons have fought, bled and died for - Do not dishonour them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
